TopicTitle: KSP Lightweight realistic advanced kerbal tech add-on

Articles.Content:
Not sure if this is the right place to post this but...

I'm thinking of publishing an add-on / mod that contains the custom parts I'm going to be using.

It's designed specifically to be lightweight so that when i build monster sized ships, it's doesn't bog down my PC but still gives me some of the more advanced tech stuff.

I've created two video's explaining what I've got so far and the principals behind why. Basically, I'm looking to see if anyone else is interested in this addon/mod?

If so, then I'll package it up for an alpha release with some instructions.

Let me know what you think, constructive criticism is always welcome.

And a quick update for a few parts in the time it took to export the virst video.

Thanks

CW
